backend/main.mo: Defines backend actor with storage mixins, access control, branding settings, and data models for cruises, itineraries, bookings, reviews, alerts, and shareable links.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking homepage hero image requirements to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides summarized descriptions of numerous frontend components, hooks, and configuration files for build reference.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind base, components, and utilities with extensive CSS variable theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML bootstrap file loading the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component handling share-link routing and rendering either the shared itinerary page or the standard homepage layout.
Displays toast notifications for new admin alerts when the caller is an admin.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboardDi: Admin dashboard modal showing alerts, bookings, logo management, and branding settings with tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/components/AdminSettingsDia: Admin settings dialog that displays user role, principal ID, app diagnostics, and allows assigning admin privileges.
frontend/src/components/AppStatusLiveLin: Shows the live app URL, copy/open controls, and backend diagnostics including version and timestamp.
frontend/src/components/BookingModal.tsx: Booking modal allowing users to select cabins, view cruise details, calculate total cost, and submit a booking.
frontend/src/components/CruiseCard.tsx: Card component displaying cruise deal details with favorite toggling and itinerary modal support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLineLogosM: Admin interface for adding, editing, previewing, and deleting cruise line logos with image upload support.
frontend/src/components/CruiseLinePartne: Section displaying cruise line partner logos or loading placeholders, with fallback when no logos exist.
Displays a dialog listing the user's favorite cruise deals, showing skeletons while loading and a fallback message if none exist.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedDeals.ts: Fetches and displays featured cruise deals in an auto-advancing carousel with loading and error states.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, destination links, social media icons, and a copyright note.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Provides the site header with navigation, authentication controls, and dialogs for favorites, bookings, and admin tools.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Shows the full-screen hero section with a preloaded background image, marketing text, and action buttons.
Displays detailed cruise itinerary info with tabs, reviews, booking actions, sharing, and PDF generation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Prompts authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and saves it via an API call.
frontend/src/components/ReviewSection.ts: Handles displaying, creating, editing, and deleting cruise reviews with authentication and star rating UI.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Implements search and filter UI for cruises, building backend-safe filters and showing matching results or all deals.
frontend/src/components/SharedItineraryP: Displays a read-only shared itinerary page with branding, handling loading, errors, and custom styling.
frontend/src/components/SharedPageBrandi: Provides a settings form for editing and resetting shared page branding, syncing with backend settings.
frontend/src/components/UserBookingsDial: Shows a dialog listing a user's bookings with status, dates, and itinerary details, including loading states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Provides a debounced version of a value, updating only after a specified delay.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks to manage Internet Identity authentication, including loading, login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating cruise-related backend data with actor-based authentication.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, including ocean and sunset color palettes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/colorValidation.ts: Provides helpers to validate CSS color strings and safely apply color styles or fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/itineraryPdf.ts: Generates a printable PDF-style itinerary by opening a new window and injecting styled HTML content.
frontend/src/utils/sharedItineraryBrandi: Defines default branding values and merges backend branding settings with defaults.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash-routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, content paths, extended color palettes, container settings, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, issues, required images, and feature requests related to maintaining a persistent full-screen cruise ship hero image on the homepage.
